title: All Purpose Miso Sauce 味噌だれ
ingredients: 1cup miso (I used Hikari Miso® Organic Red Miso) (300-320 g)
directions: Add all the ingredients in a small saucepan.
Whisk all together and bring the sauce to boil over medium heat.
Once bubbling, reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20-30 minutes until thickened.
Keep in the airtight container and store in the refrigerator for up to 2 months.
